storyInfo: After sighting Perfumer and conversing with her, Rope has a newfound awareness of aromatherapy.

attributes.content: I'm so very sorry, I was preparing the soil for some plants just now, and didn't notice I had a guest, and for a moment I overreacted...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: How shameful of me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh, no biggie. Don't mind it. I shouldn't have come in without permission.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, not at all. All my Rhodes Island friends are free to enter as they wish. There's no problem with that.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But really, Miss Rope, you could've just called for me if you were here.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh, I kinda called my lungs out. You didn't answer...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Whatever. As long as there's no danger, that's good.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Danger?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Nopety-nope, nothing. Don't mind it.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Hmm... In any case, thank you for your concern~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: However, there wouldn't be any danger in the Convalescent Garden, you know. After all, this is a place for guests to unwind in. Safety is guaranteed.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I guess, with all the security systems outside the cabin. No-one from outside Rhodes'd ever get in.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Exactly~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Speaking of which, when did you come in, Miss Rope? It's strange, there ought to be a bell in front of the door.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Bell? Oh, you mean the device thing hidden in the entranceway? I'm guessing if you touch it, it sounds a little ringy thing?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Right, that's the one. I've always treated it as a visitors' bell.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Since there were times I was so busy I wouldn't notice any guests, Closure installed the bell for me. As long as the door sounds that bell, it'll notify me even when I'm working.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I gotcha.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Heheh~ You meant that thing, huh. I jumped straight over it.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Eh? Jumped...?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh-huh. Of course I'm not gonna randomly step on stuff if I don't know where it came from! Walk without a sound, climb without a trace. That's essential survival skills.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Closure spent an hour hiding that device properly. She said nobody would ever notice it!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You really are something, Rope!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Aw, shucks, heckie darn. This stuff's my field of expertise~
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, wait, Miss Perfumer, on your face!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: There's some mud stuck to it... uh, here, here.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah, er, on my face?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hereabouts...?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh, forget it. Just lemme.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Alrighty, wiped that for you.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, thank you!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Oh, this is a different aroma. It's...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah, nothing, not in particular. Thank you.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Should be no problem if it was just a little, right?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh, right, Rope, what did you need me for?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It's very unusual to see you around here. Ah, could it be you have a new interest in perfumery? If so, you're always welcome here~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: No, that's not quite it.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, then what?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: It-It was the Doctor! Yeah, right, the Doctor!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: The Doctor begged me to get some aromatherapy stuff from here. The, uh, the regular stuff, to help with sleeping.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah, is the Doctor having trouble falling asleep again?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I guess? Seemed a little out of it on missions the past two days.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Still forced it to support the team, too... (Muttering)
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Hmm? Did you say something just now?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Nothing! You heard wrong!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Hmm... I see, then. Alright.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You want the Doctor's usual, the lavender scents, right? Of course.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you're not pressed for time, Rope, could you wait while I finish sorting out these cultivation soils before I get the aromas for you? My hands are all muddy right now; it'd be a little hard.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You can stroll about in the greenhouse for now. I'll be all done in just a moment!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Of course, no problem~ Strolling here'd be my pleasure!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: (Stirring)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hey, this flower's pretty cute. All tiny and... woah woah woah why's it so big now?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: (Stirring) (Stirring)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Whew, I felt my heart stop here.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Even a flower gets to be all dangerous. Wh—Who knew greenhouses went so deep?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: (Stirring) (Holding in laughter) (Stirring)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hm? Is this... spice? Whoa, it smells great too, nm, mm?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ha, ha, ha—choo!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hachoo, hachoo. Hic. Whoof...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm... I'm great. Hachoo.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Don't exert yourself. Those flowers and spices are all ingredients I use in my perfumery, and their scents likely aren't as nice as any end-product form. They can be a little stronger...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Try a lot stronger! Ha, hachoo!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Feels like my nose could just fall off... You deal with this stuff everyday? And you make it smell so good somehow. I'm beginning to admire you now...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Now that's just exaggerating. Oh, right, on the long table over there is a small green bottle. If your nose feels uncomfortable, you can give that a small sniff. It should be much better after that.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh—! Thank you!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Lemme see, green, green... hachoo! There it is!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah, this smells sooo so good.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I'm glad you like it. Do you feel a little better?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Wow. I'm not sneezing anymore.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: This thing does work! Real work!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: My, my. Did you perhaps doubt the power of aromatherapy? That it was just placebo effect? That they were excessive hobby goods?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: It's... it's not like I ever thought that.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. I don't mind at all.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Any amount of people will have misconceptions when they first come into contact with perfumery and aromatherapy. After all, it's a field you've never learned about. It's very normal you'd think that, Rope.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It's something I have to strive hard for—how to give people a true approach to perfumery. The willingness to approach it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh. How do I put it...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I might not get perfuming all that much, but I still know your work's real important, Perfumer.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: After all, the Doctor—heck, and even Dr. Kal'tsit—if they're both saying it's good, then it's gotta be, right?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Eh? The Doctor and Dr. Kal'tsit both...?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Yeah. I've heard them mention it a whole lotta times.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: 'Lena's aromatherapy stands dominant at the forefront of the treatment and rehabilitation domain.' ...In words kinda like that.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: And you gotta admit, there's a lotta operators who love scrambling for this place, right? I hear there's even people who just sleep in the greenhouse and don't wanna leave?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: There are a few...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I recently added a few more beds just because of that, but free space is still a concern as ever.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If things keep going on like this, I might need to ask Dr. Kal'tsit to see if the greenhouse can't be enlarged a little.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You see? You got it.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: It's pretty awesome, isn't it? You already got a bunchload of people who know the deal with perfumery.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I mean, I might not super understand it, but there's way too much I don't understand. Just 'cause I don't get something myself doesn't mean I have to say it's pointless, right?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Whoa, what's the funnies now?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Perfumer?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Heheh. I'm sorry. Mm. I'm just a little happy.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Don't you mind, Rope. In fact, if you don't mind, you can just call me Lena.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh, ah, tha-...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: And then how about I call you Ropie?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Sure, of course, sure...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Heheh. Then that's settled.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Wo-wo-wo-woah, what's going on?)
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: (Was Perfumer always so casual?)
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Um, um.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Say, Perfumer...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Uh, L-Lena.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Mhmm. What is it?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Has anyone ever told you... you're, like, really surprisingly intense.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Never, no.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're kidding.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Whatever. It works...
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Alright. That should be the cultivation soils sorted, now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll go wash my hands.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're done already? Huh, I can't really tell how this soil's different from before.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: This one's a soil for raising flowers. The proportions of what went into it might be a little special.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: For flowers?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Indeed. Gloria's therapy is into a new phase. It requires some very particular flora, with astonishingly stringent requirements for their soil.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Truthfully, I haven't been too successful the past few times I've tried to cultivate them. I wanted to try new ratios this time, and see whether there's any issues with the soil's proportions or nutrients...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ooh!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: If nutrition is the problem, then I can sort that, but some plants require things far, far beyond nutrition alone to grow, and that's where things can get a little gnarled.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I hope it can work this time. If I may say, this time I'm actually quite confident.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Sounds hecka complicated. I thought perfumery stuff would be more, uh, more sorta elegant vibes?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Y'know, like, only for rich daughters who smell nice all over, all pretty and graceful, who kinda seem like they never had to do work before.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah. Are you complimenting me, Ropie?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mm... take it that way if you want?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Thank you~ But I'm no leisurely unworking rich girl, you know.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: That's, uh, I knew that from the moment I saw you with mud stuck to your face.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Haha, don't tease me now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm. The Doctor's usual scent, let me look...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I remember putting it here. Lavender, lavender... ah, there it is.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Right, right! Yeah, little bottles just like that!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Here, take it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This one's very popular. A lot of operators use a little just before bed. Makes falling asleep easier.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ooh~ See, my experience tells me, with packaging this nice and results that good, this probably sells for a ton, right?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: It won't be expensive at all. These are internal, non-marketed. Only Rhodes Islanders get to use it, for now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Now then, perhaps you'd like to give it a try too, Ropie?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh? Try what?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Aromatherapy, of course. Aromatherapy oils diluted like this are easy to carry, and are sure to alleviate your mind! You can use them anytime, anywhere. It might become a new trend, even!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: My dear Rope, they fit beautiful young women like you perfectly! Let me recommend you these scents...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Stooop, stopstopstopstop!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: What are you doing taking all these bottles out!? H-Hold on!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Lena?!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, Ropie, what are you shrinking back for? And why the hook, too?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm just giving you some recommendations, nothing more. I'm not going to eat you, now~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eep—I dunno, I kinda sense danger here...!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: You're overthinking it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: ...Am I?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: You are.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Something tells me Im not! Uwaagh!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: *Pant*, *pant*.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Wonderful. Sure enough, you fit with fragrances perfectly, Ropie.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Fit, my patootie!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: My body leaving a scent's real bad... in a whole lotta ways, it's real bad!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you absolutely can't stand it, of course I won't force you.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But it really does fit you, you know...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Auuughhh fine I get it!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I'll use 'em! I'll use 'em, okay!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: How'd things turn out like this... ugh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Okay, I'm gonna go take the Doctor's aroma stuff now.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh yeah.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Almost forgot.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: You might be carrying some seeds on you. Put 'em away and don't lose 'em again.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're giving these back to me now? That was faster than I'd imagined. I thought it'd be at least two more days...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eh? Hold on, what are you saying? Hold up.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Are you serious? Ugh. Don't tell me you knew I took—
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Heheh. My nose is very sensitive, you know. The slightest change in the aroma of any little spot, I can tell.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Wuh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I'm—I'm sorry, I didn't mean to!!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: It's just, uh, this bad habit I have kinda... nnneugh.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Haha, no need to be like that. I'm not blaming you at all.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Hmm... truthfully, I was planning to be a little more prepared.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eh? Prepared?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Prepared what? The police? Are you turning me in so the cops can arrest me oh god oh god no no no no—
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Whaa-?! Rope?!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Calm down, just calm down, I won't turn you in, nobody's going to arrest you!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: R-R-R-Really?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Really really.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Whaahhhhh oh my god Lena you're the nicest person ever—
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: For not shedding a single tear, you've been crying an awful long time, Ropie.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eheh. Caught in the act.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Let's not mention the past, y'know! You were saying you had something prepared, Lena? What prepared?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Ah, well.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What you took with you was a packet of flower seed.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Flower... seeds?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Quite right. I was planning to prepare some suitable soil for them.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Is this kinda flower seed really expensive?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Not at all, now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Then it's really rare?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: I wouldn't say it's anything unusual.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: They're common and quite ordinary. But grow them carefully, and they'll be gorgeous when they bloom. Very suited to perfumery, too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You see, no matter what sort of seed, they all return to the soil in the end, and then they'll all flower beautifully.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Originally, my thought was that when you came to give these seeds back, I'd encourage you to plant them for yourself.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You wanted me to? Myself...?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: That's right. And then once they grew flowers, maybe I'd make an aromatic for you using them~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Eh? For me? Making aroma stuff?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: But, uh, why?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Do you absolutely want a reason? Hmm... let me think.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I think it might be—because I always felt you'd be well suited to aromatics, Ropie.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hm~, hm-hmm~, hm-hm-hmm~
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Morning dew, peppermint, shaved ice showers♪
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Yo, Doctor. Still sorting out battle reports?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Big thanks on the last mission. I thought my number was seriously up this time. Didn't think you had a plan for it forever.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: But no-one's saying you have to come with the support team, right? That's gotta be a little too dicey.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.options: I need to ensure my operators' safety.

attributes.content: Cool. When things seriously hit the floor, I'll grab you and we'll bug out together.
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Oh, yeah. Take this. This is the kind of aroma stuff you use, right?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: This, uh... Perfumer—I mean, Lena wanted me to hand this to you!
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.options: You look very happy.;Something seems a little different about you.

attributes.content: Heheh, you can tell? Is it obvious?
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Good things do that to you~
attributes.name: Rope

attributes.content: Lemme tell you a secret. There's some flowers I planted myself, and they're gonna bloom real soon.
attributes.name: Rope
